description: The disposable designator marks the target for attack. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

name: Designator, Snub (SnD-8)
description: The snub designator is a small, easy to carry designator used to mark a target for attack. Due to its smaller size, the snub designator has a reduced range.

Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Designator, Vlight (VlD-8)
description: The Vlight designator is an extremely lightweight designator used to mark a target for attack. Due to its light weight, it has a reduced range.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Mag Designator (MD-9)
description: The mag designator projects a high frequency magnetic effect to mark a target for attack. The rapid magnetic pulsing also scrambles electronic circuits and induces temporary disorientation in organic beings. Additionally, the effect shuts down magnetic equipment.

name: Grav Designator, Crewed (GrDC-10)
description: The grav designator projects a gravitic effect to mark a target for attack. The rapid gravitic pushing and pulling reduces internal structural strength in objects and induces organic damage in beings. Additionally the effect shuts down grav equipment.
